page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW.
page.content: Cornish Hall End lies on the B1057 between Finchingfield and Steeple Bumpstead the nearest town being Haverhill in Suffolk 7 miles away. Population 694. A large part of the community lives in outlying farms and hamlets an area stretching from Finchingfield to Gt.Sampford and Stambourne. The principal part of the village lines the main road,with the church, village hall public house and playing fields at the northern end where there is also a telephone kiosk post box and small childrens play area. The village comes under the administration of Braintree District Council and locally Finchingfield Parish Council.Lower Howe Street, Upper Howe Street and Little London hamlets include a number of period dwellings.
